plot: Kurt Gerstein, a guilt-ridden Nazi officer, seeks to redeem himself by betraying the Nazi party and exposing the truth of the Holocaust to the world.
title: The Gerstein Report
plot_es: Kurt Gerstein, a guilt-ridden Nazi officer, seeks to redeem himself by betraying the Nazi party and exposing the truth of the Holocaust to the world.
plot_en: Kurt Gerstein, a guilt-ridden Nazi officer, seeks to redeem himself by betraying the Nazi party and exposing the truth of the Holocaust to the world.
